Package dkeep.logic

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Behavior
    An interface for an entity's behavior.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BehaviorDrunken
    The behavior that drunken guards have.
    BehaviorGuard
    The base class for a guard's behavior.
    BehaviorRookie
    The behavior rookie guards have.
    BehaviorSuspicious
    The behavior that suspicious guards have.
    Door
    The level element that denotes a possible exit.
    Entity
    A level element.
    Guard
    The enemy found in the dungeon level.
    Hero
    The player character.
    Key
    The level element the player needs to reach in order to be able to open the level exit.
    MassiveClub
    The ogre's weapon.
    Ogre
    The enemy that attacks the player in the Keep.
    State
    The bulk of the game logic.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Guard.GuardType
    An enum for the guard type (rookie, drunken or suspicious).
